Name: Arabian Stones - The VR Sudoku Game
About the game: In this VR game, you solve Sudoku in a physical space by placing the numbers into the slots of the board. It’s still the same game but with a different viewpoint. About Sudoku The objective is to fill a 9×9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 subgrids that compose the grid contain all of the digits from 1 to 9. Options Choose your difficulty between Easy, Medium or Hard Set the scale of the board for your height or for Seated mode Support This game is built exclusively for VR.
